[Prerequisites]
Need to have Parasite Status in order to initiate dialogue.

[Armor]
Carapace Great Helm (Requires 1 Hardened Carapace)
Carapace Shell      (Requires 1 Hardened Carapace)
Carapace Greaves    (Requires 1 Hardened Carapace)

[Trait]
Luminescent (Requires Opalescent Shell)

[Trinket]
Gift Of The Iskal (Requires Killing Mar'Gosh)
